programme.title: Marco Bettio
programme.desc: Owner and founder Marco Bettio speaks about his journey to success, and bringing a bit of "Italian Love" to Shanghai.Marco’s infectious personality immediately disarms you, it’s no wonder Goodfellas is one of the city’s best establishments to find authentic Italian comfort food. His passion for authenticity and obsession for comfort, pours out every minute you spend here. This place has a charming personality and we went directly to the source.Interview: MARCO BETTIOWhen I came here 10 years ago and started to do some consulting. I started to receive a lot of guests from all around the world..and I was always forced to bring them to fine dining places. I noticed that my clients weren’t really comfortable in the fine dining experience the first day they arrived in Shanghai.That’s what moved me to bring this real Italian dining experience to this area. I would say that we would always try to give a tailormade type of service. Greeting everybody, making them feel comfortable, it’s one of the most important things for us.Actually, “Goodfellas”..is meant to mean “good friends”..and this is the idea. There is no ego, there is no name of the chef, or my name on the door,..nothing but “Goodfellas.” It’s a place to for a good time with your friends, business partners, clients..to have an intimate experience in an enjoyable way.Chef Antonio is a great master, we actually call him “the maestro”,..it’s the italian way to address a very experienced chef. Since day one, Chef has been in charge of everything inside the kitchen...scouting the best ingredients and creating the recipes. Coming from big hotels, he initially wanted the kitchen to be very serious, less smiling, less interactive, etc..I never agreed with this, so we had to find a balance. And it took almost a year until we found that balance,...after he saw the happy customers and atmosphere we knew we were on to something and it because very harmonic. There is never an argument between the kitchen and the staff, and it’s amazing. This is a very big achievement..norma

The menu, both in Thai and English, is not illustrated but cleverly written, keeping the phonetic dish names instead of an elaborated but hard to visualize description. The wine list is substantial and several excellent wines are available by the glass.

programme.title: Why day-trippers and holidaymakers are hooked on Dubai Marina
programme.desc: The glories of Dubai Marina Dubai Marina is much more than just a glamorous urban dock for luxury yachts (although its that as well!) Its also home to a huge range of chic bars and restaurants to suit all tastes and moods. And, of course, it has those iconic towers that define its famous skyline. One of the best ways to admire the architecture around Dubai Marina is from the deck of a boat. You can charter a private yacht, hop onboard an organised boat tour - or you can even cross the marina for as little as €2 in a water taxi. Five-star resorts hug the coastline. Their vast, marble-clad lobbies lead to some of Dubai’s most famous weekend brunch venues and postcard-perfect beaches. As for Dubai Marinas beach clubs, from Drift to Zero Gravity , they are dizzyingly beautiful; their pool decks are catwalks for the latest swimwear fashions. Jumereirah Beach Residence Jumeirah Beach Residence itself is the largest single-phase commercial and residential project in the world. Its strategically lined along a chic waterfront strip known as The Walk , feautring stunning 3D murals. The Walk has a very varied range of fashion, home and handicraft shops and boutiques. The outdoor pop-up market stalls offer jewellery, food treats and homeware, as well as performances by street entertainers. Jumereirah Beach Residence is made up of 40 high-rise buildings divided into six clusters, all with superb access to first-class retailers, entertainment venues and restaurants. Up on the Flying Cup The adjacent cosmopolitan shopping area The Beach has many attractions, including the floating adventure park Aqua Fun . This amazing water park makes a statement, by spelling out "I ♡ Dubai" via is pools and slides when seen from above. Another highlight at The Beach is The Flying Cup , a ride that you can sit in and be elevated to fabulous views, seen in all their glory from 40 metres up - while eating and drinking! From the top, you can see Ain Dubai, Palm Jumeirah and, of course, that wonderful Duba

programme.title: Adjusting Spending To Finance Your Retirement Savings
programme.desc: When it comes to saving for retirement, the earlier you start, no matter how little you start with, the better. However, too many of us put it off until “later”—which too often ends up being too late, or not at all. Patrina Dixon joins Your Money Your Life to share how to start saving for retirement where you are, with the money you have, NOW.

programme.title: Robert F. Smith Rev. W Richardson On The Pandemic of Racism and Black Businesses
programme.desc: Earl "Butch" Graves Jr. hosts the premiere of his new online series of interviews "From the Corner Office." His inaugural guests are Rev. Franklyn Richardson, Senior Pastor of the historic Grave Baptists Church in Mt. Vernon, New York, and billionaire Robert Smith, Chairman and CEO of private equity firm Vista Equity Partners.

programme.title: Actress Singer and author Vanessa Williams shares her journey
programme.desc: On this edition of Women of Power, we sit down with actress, singer, Broadway attraction and the former Miss America, Vanessa Williams, who talks about a challenging period in her life and how she overcame that struggle to succeed despite the odds against her. Then we hear from Lori Anne Douglass, an attorney and partner at Moses & Singer, who explains why it’s important for college-bound adults to consider creating a healthcare proxy for medical emergencies. From there, Jackie Glenn, Vice President and Global Chief Diversity Officer, offers tips to young women in the beginning stages in their careers. And finally, we take a peak inside the 2016 North American International Auto Show with luxury cars hitting the road this year.

programme.title: Leveraging AI for Marketing
programme.desc: LaTecia Johnson, who has long worked at the intersection of culture and technology, foundered INGENIUS, an AI-powered operating system that maximizes marketing programs for creators, agencies, and brands such as Reebok.

programme.title: Education Secretary Arne Duncan Discusses His Legacy
programme.desc: This week in “Our World”, Secretary of Education Arne Duncan, tells us about a bold new proposal for nonviolent offenders and a reallocation of 15 billion dollars to help getting the best teachers to help the neediest students with reading, writing and arithmetic. Our profile is Shashicka TyreHill, the first young African American woman to receive a home healthcare license in the United States, tells us how this opportunity and its expansion grew out of challenges in her personal life. Then, we get tips from Housing and Urban Development Secretary, Julian Castro, the youngest member of President Obama’s cabinet. He talks to us about how he is looking to make sure there’s affordable and accessible housing across the country. Our feature profile is a new chef, Executive Pastry Chef Mame Sow and CCAP, a program dedicated to helping to find creativity and careers in the best kitchens for kids at risk.

programme.title: Choose to Be a Leader
programme.desc: Leadership consultant Jacqueline M. Baker shares tips from her new book: “The Unexpected Leader: Discovering the Leader Within You”

programme.title: BMX 2109 Barbershop Debate
programme.desc: Laugh, joke and debate the topics of day inside the Barbershop, sponsored by Walmart.

programme.title: Portrait of Courage - Flight 93
programme.desc: Tom Burnett was a businessman from California, Todd Beamer was a software salesman from New Jersey. They just happened to be aboard flight 93, on September 11, 2001. The passengers knew they were going to die. A number of them had made cell-phone calls from the plane. They had been told what had happened at the world trade center. But Tom and Todd and others decided that Flight 93 wasn’t going to be used to kill more Americans, even if they couldn’t save themselves. Tom and Todd were part of the group who devised the plan to take the airplane back at any cost.

programme.title: In The Shadow of the Blade - Worldfest Film Festival
programme.desc: This emotion-packed documentary follows the 10,000-mile journey of a battle-scarred UH-1 “Huey” helicopter into America’s backyards to hear the untold stories of Vietnam War veterans and the families who waited for them to come home. The evocative healing power of this film has been described as “the most important thing to happen to Vietnam veterans since the dedication of The Wall.” Worldfest Film Festival Best of Show.

programme.title: Bloomberg Next Africa
programme.desc: A monthly deep dive into Africa's biggest stories through a Bloomberg lens. Global investors see the continent as one of the top areas for opportunity and growth, and some African nations are well-positioned to be global hubs for development. This show will discuss key steps taken to help deliver on Africa’s quest of bridging the gap with global powers, and track capital flows and the direction of funds amid the underlying political, economic and social developments.

programme.title: Welcome to Ouzville

programme.title: Egyptian Pyramids: Architectural Wonder or Alien Engineering?
programme.desc: The Pyramids of Egypt are among the largest structures ever built. Archeologists and researchers have determined ancient Egypt lacked the tools and skills required to build the pyramids. So how did the Egyptians build them over four thousand years ago?

programme.title: World Mysteries - Pearl Harbor: Surprise Attack or Anticipated Event?
programme.desc: December 7, 1941: The Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor, Hawaii devastates the U.S. Pacific Fleet and pushes America into World War II. . The history books fail to explain if the ‘surprise’ attack was really a surprise. This program addresses that question.

programme.title: Forbidden Science - Fatal Encounters
programme.desc: Forbidden Science is a unique blend of noir science fiction and erotic programming. Set in the near future, the stories revolve around the evil corporation, 4Ever Innovations, whose young and brilliant scientists download and sell memories. They replace those we've lost with clones and devise technology that helps us live out our greatest fantasies; from saving a failed relationship, to creating the perfect lover, to being irresistible to the opposite sex - but sometimes our deepest desires come at a terrible price. 4Ever offers customers the opportunity to live out their fantasies in a virtual world but there are secrets within 4Ever Innovations that may cost you your life.

programme.title: Scott Smiley Fighting for Life - A Soldier s Comeback

programme.title: Alicia Kozakiewicz Friend or Predator

She’d agreed to meet the “friend” with whom she’d been chatting online for six months, but by the time she realized this man was a deranged predator, it was too late. How did she manage to stay alive? And what traumatic lesson does Alicia want all parents and teens to hear?

programme.title: Paul de Gelder Saved by Sharks

programme.title: Saroo Brierley Journey Back Home
programme.desc: 5-year-old Saroo Brierley woke up on a train heading 2,000km away from his home in India & thought he’d never see his family again. Accidentally orphaned, an Australian family adopted him but Saroo couldn’t let go of the thought that his family mighty still be alive. 25 years later, he embarked on a quest to find the truth and what happens next is truly unbelievable.

programme.title: Misdiagnosed - Every Mother s Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: Victoria felt a pain in her abdomen. Doctor’s said she was faking it and then the unthinkable happened. She began to deteriorate and ended up completely paralyzed. She was a prisoner in her own body, trapped inside capable of hearing everything but incapable of responding. Doctors gave up but her mother never lost hope. That hope kept her alive and her story has captured the nation’s attention.

programme.title: Katie Piper Unbreakable Beauty
programme.desc: Pursuing the model lifestyle in London, Katie was used to gaining attention for her looks. But when her stalker Danny Lynch hired a hitman to attack Katie, her face was destroyed and she became completely unrecognizable. It should’ve been the end of her career dreams, but Katie’s revenge turned into an inspiring rise to fame. Now, THIS is how you make a comeback!﻿

programme.title: Is it too late to get ahead financially You Suck at Investing
programme.desc: The biggest financial mistake you will ever make was being born after 1980, homes are unaffordable, you need a loan to go to college, jobs are scarce and financial meltdowns are common. If you are a young person you have to ask yourself, is it too late for me to ever get ahead financially? Bill Gates, Steve Jobs, Paul Allen, Steve Balmer, Eric Schmid and Vinod Khosla all have some things in common. These men are all tech billionaires who were born in 1955. According to the author and journalist Malcolm Gladwell this is no coincidence. Gladwell argues that Bill Gates wouldn’t have founded Microsoft if he wasn’t born at just the right time. 1955 was the right time to be born if you wanted to be a tech billionaire because you would have been the right age in 1975 to capitalize on the personal computer revolution right as it was beginning. If you were born after 1980 you were the right age to start paying five figures for college tuition, six figures for a basic home and entering the job market after the dot com bust, the global financial crisis or the Covid-19 Pandemic. Gladwell noticed that people ascribe Bill Gatess success to being really smart or really ambitious. He noted that he knew a lot of people who are really smart and really ambitious, but not worth sixty billion dollars. Tech billionaires are not the only group this happens to. A common and seemingly unavoidable problem with online Role-Playing Games is that long term players who started the game when it first launched have had time to level up their characters, collect the best gear and build in game fortunes. The game developer needs new players to join the game to grow their revenue base or at minimum replace players that get bored of the game and cancel their subscriptions. New players will be competing with existing players have more actual experience behind the keyboard and have higher level characters in the game that new players just can’t compete with. Nobody wants to spend their free time getting PWNED on an old video game, so developers must

programme.title: How To Make 279 000 000 By Being A Little Snitch
programme.desc: "The SEC just paid TWO HUNDRED AND SEVENTY-NINE MILLION DOLLARS to ONE person for their role as a whistle-blower on successfully enforced corporate fraud. Here is how you can do the same thing The two hundred and seventy-nine million dollar award more than doubled the one hundred and fourteen million dollar reward that the SEC issued in October of 2020. In total their whistle blower rewards program has paid out over a billion dollars since it was established in 2010. The best part is because the Dodd-Frank Act protects the confidentiality of whistle-blowers and informants no additional information is known about the people who have received these life changing payouts. The securities and exchange commission actually recognises in their press releases that these payouts have added up to a lot of money that could have been given back to the victims of financial crime. But there is three good reasons that [despite the spiralling costs] the SEC has kept the program and actually doubled down on promoting it with payout leader boards and flashy announcements every time a big payout is made. You get the feeling that if it wasnt for the informant privacy laws they would present a novelty size check in front of the press like the whistle-blowers just won the Powerball. But they cant so if you decide that you like the idea of a completely anonymous multi-million-dollar payday I will also tell you the steps that you need to take to become a successful snitch. The first reason that the SEC has set up this program is that its very hard to collect evidence on the white-collar crime they go after. Insider trading hurts regular investors but if the insiders are careful about their communications channels, they can make it almost impossible to collect evidence even with full time surveillance. The SEC admits that a significant amount of clearly illegal activity goes undetected or unpunished. programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

programme.title: Bitcoin Jesus: The Prosecution of Roger Ver
programme.desc: They call him “Bitcoin Jesus,” though he despises the nickname. His real name is Roger Ver. At any moment, Roger could be arrested for alleged tax evasion and mail fraud. As devastating as this is for Roger, this case is less about him and more about you.

programme.title: Interview with Marimuthu
programme.desc: Welcome to Tele Vikatan, your one-stop destination for everything television! Get ready to immerse yourself in the captivating world of TV shows, exclusive interviews, soap opera reviews, and more. Our dedicated team is here to bring you the latest updates and behind-the-scenes insights from the exciting realm of television. Discover the thrill of your favorite television dramas as we delve into their gripping storylines and unforgettable characters. Join us as we go beyond the screen to explore the lives of your beloved TV stars through exclusive interviews, where they share their experiences, anecdotes, and behind-the-scenes stories. At Tele Vikatan, we are passionate about delivering high-quality content that caters to the diverse tastes and interests of our viewers. Whether youre a fan of heartwarming family dramas, thrilling mysteries, or gripping romance, we have something for everyone. We provide you with informative and entertaining videos that enhance your TV viewing experience. With Tele Vikatan, youll never miss a moment of the television magic.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 40
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: Super Gummy
programme.desc: Accidentally convinced that he’s a super hero, Gummy becomes Mind-O-Man – and sets out to help out everybody... to the point of driving them CRAZY!

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: THE SAND WITCH
programme.desc: The Clean Bee has stolen all the sand from the beach to build herself a massive and very clean hive-castle.

programme.title: The Grasshopper and the Ant
programme.desc: The long, freezing winter has arrived for both the Ants, who worked hard from Spring to Autumn, and the Grasshopper, who sang and played all along.

programme.title: The Rolling Rice Ball
programme.desc: WI-Go drops one of his rice balls in a rat hole and gets a handful of jewelry in return. Meanwhile, a greedy neighbor next door UGo hears the news.

programme.title: Down With Flu
programme.desc: Don is down with flu and his sneezes have left the mice sleepless. They take it as their sole responsibility to stop Don’s sneezes by hook or crook! From medicinal ginger tea to ringing up the doctor they try it all to stop the flu.

programme.title: An Alien Visit
programme.desc: It’s a nice cold night and Keet is resting on the terrace of the house enjoying the night stars. Suddenly a small space ship crash lands on the terrace and a cute little alien the same size of Keet comes out.

programme.title: The Old Car
programme.desc: GrandPA wants to go out of town to visit his son, But the whole car has just collapsed and fallen apart . So tells Dunky to service his car and get it ready for him by the evening as he is resting in his room.

programme.title: FREAKY FRUIT
programme.desc: Deep in the dojo, the Fruit Ninjas discover some powerfully magical fruit, but their secret is discovered by the Clean Bee.

programme.title: MeetZoonicornAliel
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: AWARD PE AWARD
programme.desc: A local committee makes a surprise visit to hotel Kelifornia and presents Chai Raja with the Best Chef Award. Chai Raja is thrilled and places the award on the shelf and gives the duty of safe-guarding it to Sundar. And suddenly Basha develops a fascination for the trophy. Instantly, poor Sundars life turns into living hell. Things reach a crazy climax when the trophy from Sundars hands falls on the ground and breaks into a hundred pieces right in front of Chai Rajas eyes. Chai Raja is literally shivering in fury, Sundar is literally shivering in fear and Basha is literally shivering trying to control his laughter. And that very moment the local committee comes again with a larger trophy. A surprised Chai Raja gracefully takes a bow to accept yet another award. But to everyones sheer shock, the committee gives the trophy to Sundar for being the best waiter. And Chai Raja and Basha faint instantly...followed by Sundar!!!

programme.title: Nardilicious
programme.desc: Its the annual Cake Festival and the Villains have tampered with Nardys famous recipe, causing the Super Sixs heads to swell and get stuck together. Can they figure out how to use their powers together to stop Sneevil from stealing the Smighty Stones?

programme.title: Cinema Night
programme.desc: Blockbusters have released and Don and Colonel are in the theatre to get tickets. But the naughty rats pick their pocket and buy tickets. Now the dogs are penniless and would go to any extend to get into the theatre. But when the trio enters the picture, the poor dogs suffer like anything. But, Larry Marly and Charly will end up in deep mess. Wait and watch!

programme.title: Tidy Up Time
programme.desc: Deedee almost falls on her bottom, if not for Nino’s timely save, by tripping on a big red ball in her courtyard. It looks like the twins are having a playing spree but are not careful in keeping things back where they belong. Charlie can’t stand the mess any more that he posts Sandy and Boris with the chore of tidying up the entire place before he gets back from his postman duties that day. Charlie furthers the chore by cautioning them that any toys that are not kept back in their rightful places will be given away, to which the twins sadly agree. But more than tidying, the twins set out messing up what Deedee and Nino are patiently helping them with. The twins neither want Uncle Charlie to give away any of their toys nor are they able to clean it up soon enough. It seems only Deedee’s magic can help them, much to the dismay of Nino. Not only do all the toys magically shut themselves in the toy chest, all of them are nowhere to be seen when Sandy peeps in. The spell seems to have been too strong that it made the toys clear away from the home of the twins and fall in different places all over Abra-Dabra, in Tiggy’s cooking pot, inside Mayor De Pfeffle’s shoe, in Mewmew’s garden, in the front yard of the Doobydoos, and everywhere else. They all set out to get the toys back for the twins but the toy zebra and the toy frog are nowhere to be seen. Finally they find them with the Doobydoos who think the toys belong to them. So Boris and Sandy decide to give them other toys in exchange for Dr Frog and Zuzu. Uncle Charlie returns to see the twins happily play with their most favourite toys and appreciates them for making the home sparkling clean.

programme.title: Rock- N- Roll Don
programme.desc: It is chaos and war in the house. And in the middle of this, Don gets hold of a guitar. He sprouts a new passion- music! But for all others it is unbearable. They try everything possible to stop Don, in vain. Things go global when Colonel joins the team with his drums!! Noise pollution it is…

programme.title: Smighty Claus
programme.desc: Sneevil dresses up like Smighty Claus to ruin Smighty Christmas. Can Melody and the rest of the Super Six stop him before he steals all the presents in Smightyland.

programme.title: Sing For Your Supper
programme.desc: Deedee is excited to prepare for Mayor De Pfeffle’s banquet the next night, so she is all ready for the much needed sleep and yawns away on her cosy bed. But she and all of Abra-Dabra is wide-awake because of Luciano’s late night opera rehearsal. The next day everyone is so sleepy eyed that they request Luciano as politely as ever possible that they could all sleep if Luciano didn’t sing at night. But Luciano is outraged and declares he will never sing ever again. Thinking that the problem is solved they all return to their homes to practice for the upcoming banquet. Deedee tries out a food invisibility spell on an apple, but ended making all the fruits on the table disappear. But the magic didn’t happen only in Deedee’s house, but all over Abra-Dabra in an alarming rate that Mayor De Pfeffle had to ask Deedee to find a way to reverse it. But when she turns back to her usual self and cannot find Nino, she sings out Nino’s name that make a cherry fruit pop up in a tree, and she is amazed to note that more singing brings the food back. So she rounds up all of Abra-Dabra to sing together to bring the food back. They are able to bring back some of the food, but not just enough for the banquet, so Deedee asks Mayor De Pfeffle to request Luciano to help them out. But Luciano is too puffed up in pride and indignation that he outrightly refuses. Mayor De Pfeffle has no other choice but to postpone the banquet. Discouraged and hungry, Deedee sings a little and gets a small morsel to give her hungry friends, but just then her plate is so full of food when Luciano sings out. He even comes to town-hall where he sings his best and all the food comes back. Overjoyed, Mayor De Pfeffle asks if Luciano would grace the banquet with his awesome talent. Luciano agrees to sing promising to all that he will never again disturb them at night.

programme.title: SCHOOLS OUT!
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to play Bingo, Pai and Xia say it’s party time! They get April to dance, but she loses her fan, which falls down to the Chou World. Amkko and Koto use it to fly up to the Yan World on the giant mutant chicken. While April distracts the mutants with tango lessons, Xia and Pai send the chicken packing.

programme.title: Beach Boys
programme.desc: The sun shining bright up in the sky, what a perfect day to laze around on the beach! But the beach boys are in for some mean surprises! Stolen picnic baskets, flying sandwiches, mixed up sun tan lotions and shark attacks.

programme.title: MILKY MESS
programme.desc: Business is brisk and Chai Raja frets as the milkman has not arrived and he is almost all out of milk. Sundar gets a so called brain-wave and lures in a genial cow from the not distant yard to help restore supply. Chai Raja is favourably impressed but then equally depressed when following the cow, enters a pugnacious bull not all happy with Sundar for wooing away his girlfriend. Its manic mayhem as the bull chases Sundar around the tea-shop, lent a generous helping hand by Basha who seems to know every trick in the book to drive the bull berserk and Sundar barking mad.

programme.title: Money In The Bank
programme.desc: Money money money! Dons safe is full of money. And colonel suggests to put the money in bank. But, Charly Marly and Larry want to become rich!!! and they will just not let go of the money. It is pandemonium in the house and the bank. Bang bang bang!

programme.title: DANCE DOJO
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to master dancing, much to Xia’s annoyance. April teaches Xia a move that he uses to defeat a Worm Monster and to earn his mondojitsu Brown Socks.

programme.title: Ant Attack!
programme.desc: It is a usual day in the house with the war between the dogs and the rats. And there is a new group. In fact an army of enemies – ants! And they make the life in the house a living hell. For the first time Don , Colonel and the rat trio get a real taste of the bad ants.

programme.title: Gummys Little Pet.
programme.desc: Gummy gets a small pet fish with a HUGE appetite – and he, Harry and Kala soon find that feeding this ever-ravenous, ever-growing pet is pretty much a full-time job!

programme.title: Turn the Paige
programme.desc: Paige Turner is the head librarian at the old Alexander Tyler Poe library. Paige is dedicated, helpful, and very sweet. But when a a mysterious Green Mist appeared one fateful Halloween night, things changed forever at the old library. Find out what strange and creepy things happened to Paige, the janitor, and a forgotten bag of candy!

programme.title: Rose Trick
programme.desc: Dunky is taking special care of a beautiful red rose in his garden which he plans to give it to his girlfriend in the evening. And has just stopped Cat from almost ruining it.

programme.title: Prickly Pair
programme.desc: Nino is having a tough time trying to put his daisies up as desired to win the Wonderful Window Box competition that Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting. Deedee cheers him up by saying that flowers can be placed anywhere as long as it makes Abra-Dabra more beautiful. Just then Mewmew runs in all flustered and panicky. The problem seems to be that the creeper plant at Mewmew’s window hasn’t grown big enough to creep all around the heart-shaped support. But Deedee can’t help with magic, as it would be unfair in the competition against everyone else. Charlie loves his display but is being overprotective by shooing the twins away to play ball elsewhere. The twins accidentally throw the ball directly at Uncle Charlie’s display, knocking them all down and breaking them in the process. But there’s no time to fix them up without magic. Deedee brews a magic potion with a few ingredients. The magic potion makes all of Charlie’s flowers into cacti, something Charlie dislikes the most. Since Deedee feels she’s let Charlie down, they all decide to take theor very own flowers to replace Charlie’s exhibit. But with a sudden spelt of rain, all are damaged by the time they reach Charlie’s. But the rain has also caused the cacti to bloom, a rare sight indeed. Mayor De Pfeffle awards Uncle Charlie with the honour of being winner of the Wonderful Window Boz contest. But Charlie wants to share the award with all his friends

programme.title: Golden Eggs
programme.desc: Hoodie has his eyes on the hens eggs in GrandPAs farm. Keet has saved them once but is sure Hoodie will try again.

programme.title: Pool Off
programme.desc: Ever seen sharks in a swimming pool? The Rat-a-tat swimming pool has many such surprises including grenades, sharks and weights! Watch Colonel twist and turn to woo a hottie.

programme.title: "Water, Water Every Where"
programme.desc: GrandPA takes the trio for a small ride to the nearby towns newly opened mini waterpark. Cat is all excited and is wearing water goggles and a snorkeling gear.

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: To complete the next step on her Mondojitsu Path, April has to master the dance of the falcon. Since Xia won’t help because he’s too embarrassed to dance with her, April accepts the assistance of Mei, who turns out to be a great dancer. While they’re distracted, Negu sends Amkko and Koto to steal the Glove of the North, but Mei, who feels appreciated for the first time in his life, helps April to win it back.

programme.title: Colour Chaos
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffel can’t decide what colour to paint the town hall as it is so dull and grey. So Deedee offers to help, without magic this time, by getting a town vote as to which colour is liked best. Deedee and Nino go ahead and do just that, asking each and everybody they see in Abra-Dabra and noting their choice of colours. Boris and Sandy are confused so set out to paint and decide, but end up messing up the wall. They seek the help of Deedee, who is all so ready to help. But Nino is scared things will get worse with the powerful magic spell, and with good reason. The spell not only “cleaned” Charlie’s wall but made grey stripes on the walls of every house in Abra-Dabra! Even Tiggy’s yellow house is all grey!! So Deedee and everybody else pitch in and paint every house back to its original colour. So the final building standing is the town hall, but no one has sufficient pain for any one colour. So they finally decide to paint it with every colour they have, like a rainbow!

programme.title: Cinema Night
programme.desc: Blockbusters have released and Don and Colonel are in the theatre to get tickets. But the naughty rats pick their pocket and buy tickets. Now the dogs are penniless and would go to any extend to get into the theatre. But when the trio enters the picture, the poor dogs suffer like anything. But, Larry Marly and Charly will end up in deep mess. Wait and watch!

programme.title: Balloonastics
programme.desc: When Pancake becomes bored with a household chore, he gives up in frustration. Later in the Zooniverse, he’s delighted to help the fallen North Star return to the night sky, but first he has to learn to value the smaller task he has been given, and how it can add to the whole. Be open minded and optimistic, and you’ll be able to take pride in any job!

programme.title: Pinecone
programme.desc: Creativity has no limits, watch Hepi and Briko transform these cones into something lovely

programme.title: Maroon
programme.desc: When Kala tells Gummy and Harry that her favourite color is maroon, the pair decide to give her an ‘all maroon’ birthday surprise – but they soon learn that there can sometimes be ‘too much of a good thing’.

programme.title: There's no place like home
programme.desc: The twins meet a lizard who doesn’t like the place where she lives and is convinced that other animals are luckier than her. When they help her settle in the “perfect” place, the lizard realizes what she’d be missing if she left home.

programme.title: The Boy Who Cried Wolf
programme.desc: The shepherd boy is bored of uneventfully peaceful days. One day, he gets an idea for a prank - to lie about seeing a wolf to his village people.

programme.title: Christmas Episode
programme.desc: Its Christmas time and Gummy Bear and all his pals are out to celebrate Christmas. They are going to have some serious fun along with some surprises!!

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: DEEP FRIED PRIDE
programme.desc: After discovering a powerful ancient mask that transforms him in to a (finally) formidable opponent, Mark turns on Durian and decides to pull rank

programme.title: Remote War
programme.desc: Don and the terrific trio are at war for the TV remote. It all comes down to a swallowed remote that changes channels with every hiccup. Now that is very convenient. The mice get ready in Scuba Gear to perform a close tummy surgery to save the remote. Will sentimental soap or Jolly Good cricket win the Toss?

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Speed decides its time for an all out assault on the Shadowy Organization. They manage to get the part back, but in the process Speed Sr. is captured. The kids have to save dad and eventually do, but they discover that Speed and Xs mom is Trixie, leader of the Shadowy org.

programme.title: Three's A Pain
programme.desc: When Pancake, Odessa, and Maple end up getting into a tiff over some colored chalk they’re using to draw pictures with, they ALL wind up in the Zooniverse at the same time that night! Sharing is caring. / Teamwork is the way.

programme.title: Coin
programme.desc: What to do with all that spare change? Hepi and Briko have an idea for you

programme.title: FREAKY FRUIT
programme.desc: Deep in the dojo, the Fruit Ninjas discover some powerfully magical fruit, but their secret is discovered by the Clean Bee.

programme.title: The Speed record
programme.desc: MewMew has a new stopwatch and wants to time everything that everyone does, to get to them to do it at record speed. Life in Abra-Dabra becomes intolerable as everyone tries to be quicker than the next person. Eventually Deedee and the others persuade MewMew to break all his speed records. When he achieves it no one applauds him, so MewMew realises that many things are better done in their own sweet time. He also realises that by doing everything fast, he is missing out on enjoying many things.

programme.title: Plot for Teacher
programme.desc: Speed and his friends have succeeded in acquiring the missing part from the Shadow Organization, but upon trying to make it work with the Mach 6, they are thrust into an alternate reality where the Shadowy Organization is in charge. They must return the part to where they found it, in Shadowy Org HQ, in order to get back to the present. Now that theyve had a glimpse of the Shadowy org.s master plan, they know what they have to do to stop them.

programme.title: Baby Sitting
programme.desc: It’s the summer holidays. GrandPA’s daughter is visiting her dad from the neighboring town with her year old baby.

programme.title: Unready To Rumble
programme.desc: Wally K’s bullying moves Fred to challenge him to a fight, secretly confident that Friday can become special fighting gloves for him. When Friday loses his memory though, Fred tries to cancel the fight, but can’t. Luckily, an attack by the cute aliens, the Cuddlemuffins take Wally down, and Fred gets the credit.

programme.title: Flower Power
programme.desc: Zap doubts that Leila is tough enough, but she proves you dont mess with her when Sneevil vacuums up Smightyland and the Smighties.

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: Invincible Dragon - Saitn George’s Legend
programme.desc: SANDRA visits her UNCLE TONY at the old funfair where he works and is shocked to hear that it is about to shut down, because of falling visitor numbers. When she is on the ghost train, she is visited by her assistant FO, who has come to get her for a new case in the “Land of Fairytales”. On this occasion, SANDRA and FO travel into the legend of “Saint George and the Dragon”, where they face a very singular DRAGON.

programme.title: Talent Show
programme.desc: As Dunky warms up the milk in the morning he hears the “The Great Indian talent show” announcement coming to town. He’s all excited. He goes to his room , gets out his old song record disk - blows off the dust and puts it on the gramophone .

programme.title: Books And Roses
programme.desc: Braianna’s Fake Robot Parents go on love overdrive, hoarding every book and rose in town, just as they are in demand for the romantic holiday.

programme.title: Atchoo!
programme.desc: The Guardians meet a very cute mutant with a terrible cold. They decide to adopt it and name it Atchoo. When the Guardians see that the gates of the Magic Fort standing open, they think Atchoo has betrayed them. But in fact, Atchoo has been captured by Amkko and Koto, who wanted to get Negu’s defective mutant back again. The Guardians free their friend and discover that the only ones at the Magic Fort were the Wise Elders, doing a spot of cleaning.

programme.title: Lets Get Kraken
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Fastest Porter in the Land
programme.desc: Aladdins in big trouble when he forgets to deliver the egg traders eggs to market. Luckily Jamillah brings him a bike. After teaching him how to ride, they head off to deliver the eggs only for them to break them along the way. They eventually have to ask Genie to help by conjuring some eggs. After a few failed attempts it seems he manages it but we discover Genies magic eggs have a surprise inside that delights the customers.

programme.title: Melody's Powerful Music
programme.desc: Sneevil creates a powerful magnet to draw an iron asteroid towards Smightyland. Melody must summon her power of rock to blast the asteroid out of the sky before its too late.

programme.title: Road Trip Snag
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is on a journey in their house on wheels. But hey! With the rats around, will they ever have a peaceful anything??? It is indeed a fun for the trio, but not for poor Don and Colonel. The house on wheels turns into a madhouse on wheels!

programme.title: Day At The Spa
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want to pamper themselves. Yes!! a complete spa treatment. And when Larry Marly and Charly enter the scene, spa becomes a punishment for Don and Colonel. But when they are at their wits end, the dogs make sure that, the naughty rats learn a lesson. How does the twist happen??

programme.title: The Big Picture
programme.desc: Mort snaps a picture of Brains fighting Aphrodite, a glamorous alien woman. After Mr. Fractal confiscates Mort’s camera phone, Mort and Fred compete to get it back.

programme.title: The Big Cleanup!
programme.desc: It’s a messy affair. Floors covered with mud, walls with cake splattered and filth in every nook and cranny. Don sweeps, mops, vacuums and leaves the house sparkling new but when he returns back after throwing the trash, the house is again bombarded with dirt! This goes on till Don and Colonel pack their bags and decide to leave the house. Will they ever return?

programme.title: Coco Jumbo
programme.desc: It’s the time of the month when the coconuts from the trees have to be removed to be send the market for sale. GrandPA has entrusted Dunky to do this job.

programme.title: Afternoon Off
programme.desc: To prove to Brains he can go one day without Friday, Fred agrees to a day without him, picking a day he ends up desperately needing him.

programme.title: PAI THE WIZARD
programme.desc: Discouraged with cleaning Maestro Meow’s humble hut, Pai uses the Elder’s conch horn (which Pai thinks is magic) to summon what he thinks are “Cleaner Birds.” But they prove to be Party Birds, and soon have overrun the Westerly Breeze!

programme.title: The Garden Guardians
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to take care of their vegetable garden while they go on a trip. Xia and April think it’s the dullest job ever, but Pai is over the moon. Negu seizes the chance to send his Mutant Beetles, who try to wreck the garden, making Pai’s life impossible. He has to use a secret known only to the most green-fingered gardeners to beat the Mutants and save the garden.

programme.title: Chill Out
programme.desc: A hot summer afternoon. The fan has stopped working and the ice trays are empty, and who could be responsible for putting Don through all this sweat! Mottu Lambu and Chottu giggle as they watch Don spinning along with the fan, getting frozen inside a locked deep freezer. Colonel is all set to rescue Don, but will he succeed?

programme.title: Distemper Tantrum
programme.desc: Maple has difficulty learning to float in the Zooniverse. Be persistent and you can learn to stay calm by thinking happy thoughts.

programme.title: Detective Duda
programme.desc: Scot receives a special pair of underwear at his home. He puts it on and goes to sleep, excited to show it to his friends the next day. But when he wakes up, he discovers that he had a small accident. Afraid that his friends would make fun of him, he goes to dry his underwear, but the wind blows it away to Pinkar. Meanwhile, Dadas watch has disappeared. Duda plays detective and tries to solve the mystery. However, when the friends catch Scot on top of Pinkar, they jump to conclusions and accuse him of taking the watch. Scot, embarrassed to tell them the truth, runs away. Its up to Duda to get to the bottom of things. Will Detective Duda solve the case and save the day?

programme.title: Amor que mata
programme.desc: Antón y Polina se convierten en las fichas de un juego mortal lleno de jugadas peligrosas, pasiones y engaños.

programme.desc: Serafina es una exitosa empresaria. Pero su vida da un giro cuando alguien cercano muere de repente.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Raiders of Galaxy 1982
programme.desc: A group of young space cadets use a technologically advanced mecha to combat an evil extraterrestrial race that is trying to take over the galaxy

programme.title: Lights Fantastic 1942
programme.desc: A tour of the bright lights of New York City, where the various advertising signs come to life.

programme.title: A Haunting we Will Go 1949
programme.desc: Casper the Friendly Ghost, sad that he can make no friends since everyone he meets is afraid of him, hatches an abandoned egg and becomes the emerging little duck's best friend and protector.

programme.title: Me Feelins is Hurt 1940
programme.desc: Olive writes a letter to Popeye: she's through with sailors; it's cowboys for her. Popeye immediately sails off to the West, where he finds, who else, Bluto as the head of the ranch where Olive is enthralled. Bluto gives Popeye a wild horse to ride, and, after a few humiliating defeats, Popeye conquers it (and wins back Olive's heart). Bluto punches Popeye out, and into the clutches of what can best be described as a rattlesnake constrictor. Bluto then starts menacing Olive, so Popeye eats his spinach, saves her, and defeats Bluto and his gang.

programme.title: Superman Cartoon 1
programme.desc: Superman cartoons 1

programme.title: The Return of Mr. Hook -1945
programme.desc: Seaman Hook has big plans for after the war, mostly involving rushing home and marrying his sweetie. So do his fellow seaman, but theirs involve buying bond

programme.title: Space Transformer 1985
programme.desc: Using new technology, a crew consisting of Captain Chi, Nancy, and the robots Baipam and Diatron 5, is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into Ivy's body in order to defeat the invaders. Enlisting benevolent beings found inside Ivy's body, the crew prepares for an inner space battle that can decide the fate of the world.

programme.title: Raw! Raw! Rooster 1956
programme.desc: Foghorn's annoying college buddy, Rhode Island Red, comes for a visit and then won't leave. What's worse, he muscles in on Foggy's harem and reverses most of Foggy's traps and tricks. A football session with an exploding casaba melon backfires when Red returns the pass; the exploding golf balls only explode when Foghorn hits them, and the fist in the camera only pops out when Foggy examines it to figure out what went wrong. But Foghorn finally gets the last laugh with a phony telegram about an inheritance and an exploding bowling ball as a parting gift.

programme.title: Nearly Weds 1957
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto both plan to marry Olive Oyl, but Popeye proposes first. When Olive says, "Yes!" to Popeye, Bluto sets out to make Popeye look bad, break up the wedding, and win Olive over.

programme.title: Ride Him, Bosko -1931
programme.desc: BosKo in the Wild West, tries to have fun with any situation that come in his way.

programme.title: Quack a Doodle Doo 1950
programme.desc: His Mama is the only one who love Baby Huey, an overgrown clumsy ugly duckling. The other Mamas and their broods shun him like the plague and make his little life miserable. But when a ferocious fox attacks the barnyard, Huey comes to the rescue of one and all. Huey is a hero basking in his new-found popularity. First of the series.

programme.title: Birth of a Notion 1947
programme.desc: Daffy Duck cons a dog named Leopold into offering him a stay in his house, but he has to hide Daffy from his master, a Peter-Lorre style mad scientist who needs a duck's wishbone.

programme.title: Superman cartoons 3
programme.desc: Superman cartoons 3

programme.title: War Feathers 1926
programme.desc: The gang is on a train trip with their parents through the "old West". They sneak off the train at a town called Hot Dog, and find themselves mixed up with a gunfight, a covered wagon and a bandit hideout.

programme.title: Those Love Pangs -1914
programme.desc: Charlie and a rival vie for the favors of their landlady. In the park they each fall for different girls, though Charlie's has a male friend already. Charlie considers suicide, is talked out of it by a policeman, and later throws his girl's friend into the lake. Frightened, the girls go off to a movie. Charlie shows up there and flirts with them. Later both rivals substitute themselves for the girls and attack the unwitting Charlie. In an audience-wide fight, Charlie is tossed through the screen.

programme.title: The Lucy Show; Season 5; Episode 19; Lucy Meets the Law
programme.desc: Lucy is accused of being the notorious red-haired shoplifter who has been victimizing area stores.

programme.title: The Lucy Show 1967; Season 5; Episode 15;
programme.desc: Viv flies to California to visit Lucy and admits that she's looking for a young college student from her hometown whom she believes has fallen in with the no-good beatnik crowd. Lucy and Viv disguise themselves as hippies to track the youth down.

programme.title: The Lucy Show 1966: Season 5; Episode 8; Lucy and Carol in Palm Springs
programme.desc: Lucy calls in sick so she can join her roommate at a Palm Springs resort. Unfortunately, her boss, Mr. Mooney, is staying at the same hotel.

programme.title: Mabel's Busy Day
programme.desc: A hotdog girl gives one to a policeman who then allows her into a race track. While other customers swipe her hotdogs, Charlie runs off with the whole box, pretending to sell them while actually giving them away. She calls her policeman who battles Charlie

programme.title: Midnight Manhunt-1945
programme.desc: In a cheap hotel room in New York City Jelke shoots gangster Joe Wells, takes a package from his pocket and flees.Wells staggers into an alley. On her way to her apartment above a wax museum, Sue Gallagher, a reporter for the Chronicle, finds Wells' body and hides his corpse among the wax-figures in the museum and calls her paper to send a photographer so she can get a scoop on the killing of Wells, who had a $5,000 reward for his capture, dead or alive. Meanwhile, Henry Miggs, the museum owner find the body and is ready to call the police but his handyman, Clutch Tracy tells him to conceal it and avoid suspicion. From this point on it is a game of where-is-the-body....and the stolen South American diamonds Wells was carrying.

programme.title: No Noise-1923
programme.desc: The gang pays Mickey a visit at the hospital. They switch vaccination orders with another group of kids, but the staff catches on and gives them false diseases to worry about.

programme.title: The latest sports that you may have missed!
You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!
Game previews, highlights and interviews from your favorite sport!
See what happened in the world of sports while you were sleeping!
Spook Town 1944
programme.desc: Dty Gulch Trading Post owner Kurt Fabian advances money on mortgages to the local settlers to finance an irrigation program. Three Texas Rangers, Tex Wyatt, Jim Steele and Panhandle Perkins transport the money in a strong box which they place in the Wells Fargo safe as agent Sam Benson assures them that he is the only one who knows the safe combination. Fabian conspires with Bill Gunner, Breed Crocker and Trigger Booth to steal the money and they fail, but Fabian gets it on his own. Benson is arrested, and a committee of citizens, led by Oscar Perrin accuse Captain Wyatt and the Rangers of carelessness and request the resignation of the Captain if the money is not recovered. Fabian owns the abandoned ghost town of "Mystic", and Gunner, Crocker and Booth take him there to force him to tell where he has hidden the money, They shoot at his feet to intimidate him and he dies from fright and shock. Tex, Jim and Panhandle are also searching the town and they find Fabian's body. Benson tells Lucy Warren that the money may be hidden in the old Wells Fargo office in Mystic and they go there and find the strongbox. Enter Gunner, Crocker and Booth. Enter the Rangers. Gunfight

programme.title: Haunted Ranch 1943
programme.desc: Both the Range Busters and Rance and his outlaw gang are looking for stolen gold bullion. To scare people away from the ranch where the gold is hidden, Rance has his man imitating ghosts. The gold is in a steel cased organ but a certain combination of organ stops need to be pulled to obtain the gold.

programme.title: Mask of the Avenger 1938
programme.desc: During the European revolutionary fervor of 1848, Italian Captain Renato Dimorna tries to avenge his father's death, goes against the corrupt local military governor Larocca and prevents an Austrian military invasion.

programme.title: A String of Blue Beads 1953
programme.desc: In A String of Blue Beads, a touching holiday drama unfolds when a kindly shopkeeper shares the story of a simple Christmas gift that changed a life. As memories of love, sacrifice, and compassion are revealed, the tale reminds us that the season’s true treasures are not found in wealth, but in the bonds of the heart. Gentle, heartfelt, and timeless, this short film delivers a moving message about giving and the enduring power of kindness.

programme.title: Rudolf the Rednosed Reindeer 1948
programme.desc: In Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer, the beloved Christmas song comes to life in an enchanting animated short. When a young reindeer is mocked for his glowing red nose, he fears he’ll never find his place—until a foggy Christmas Eve when Santa calls on Rudolph to guide his sleigh. With charming animation, festive music, and a timeless message about courage and acceptance, this holiday classic has warmed hearts for generations.

programme.title: Santa Claus vs The Devil 1959
programme.desc: In Santa Claus vs. The Devil, Christmas magic collides with mischief in a one-of-a-kind holiday fantasy. As Santa prepares for his yearly journey, the Devil sends his wicked helper Pitch to tempt children and ruin the season of giving. From a workshop in the clouds to fiery battles of good versus evil, Santa must outwit the forces of darkness to deliver joy across the world. Whimsical, bizarre, and unforgettable, this cult classic proves that not even the Devil himself can steal Christmas.

programme.title: The Great Commandment 1939
programme.desc: In The Great Commandment, a stirring tale of faith and sacrifice unfolds in the days of Roman-occupied Judea. When young Joel defies his father’s wishes and joins the Zealots in their fight against tyranny, he soon encounters a teacher whose message of love and forgiveness changes his path forever. Blending history, drama, and spiritual awakening, this powerful film explores the struggle between violence and compassion—and the timeless call to live by the greatest commandment of all.

programme.title: The Hurricane Express
programme.desc: When his father is killed in a train wreck, Larry Baker vows to unmask a mysterious criminal called "The Wrecker," who has targeted the L&M Railroad for deadly" accidents."

programme.title: Airborne
programme.desc: California born and raised surfer, Mitchell Goosen has to spend six months in Ohio while learning the hard way- love is where the heart is.

programme.title: Sheriff Of Tombstone 1941
programme.desc: Roy Rogers brings law and order to the Old West in Sheriff of Tombstone! Sent to clean up the infamous frontier town, Rogers finds himself facing a crooked mayor and a gang of outlaws determined to run things their way. With the help of loyal allies and a song or two along the trail, he fights for justice and wins the hearts of the townsfolk. Packed with action, music, and Western spirit, it’s Roy at his heroic best.

programme.title: Arizona Stagecoach (1942) Colorized
programme.desc: In Arizona Stagecoach, cowboy star Ray ‘Crash’ Corrigan teams up with Dennis Moore and Max Terhune for another hard-riding adventure. When a ruthless gang plots to seize control of the stage line, the heroes saddle up to protect the trail and defend the innocent. With blazing six-guns, daring stunts, and a touch of Alibi’s trademark humor, this action-packed Western delivers thrills straight from the saddle.

programme.title: Guests Daniella Moodie, Krystal Ball
programme.desc: VP Kamala Harris’s ascension to Presidential nominee is an extraordinary historical moment. I talk with Danielle Moodie and Krystal Ball about what this all means and where we’re going.

programme.title: Guest Bryant Terry
programme.desc: Bryant Terry is a chef as well as an artist and a food justice activist. If you love great vegan food, he is the man.

programme.title: Guest Aba Blankson
programme.desc: Aba Blankson, Chief Marketing & Communication Officer of the NAACP on Vice President Kamala Harris, the elections, and the continued advocacy of the NAACP.

programme.title: Guest Tamala Jones
programme.desc: Tamala Jones talks about her role as Rose in the upcoming movie ORDINARY ANGELS, a powerful film about finding your purpose and making a difference. The movie features an outstanding ensemble cast, including Hilary Swank, Alan Ritchson, and Nancy Travis. It is directed by Jon Gunn and comes from the studio that brought you WONDER and the creators of JESUS REVOLUTION.

programme.title: Guests Tiffany Doing Things, Cheris Monique, and Aja Small
programme.desc: Yonathan Elias is joined by Tiffany Doing Things, Cheris Monique, and Aja Small, who play Couch Party for the Culture and for cash!

programme.title: At Home with The Jenners - Planting Roots
programme.desc: From garden to gourmet, join Cayley & Brandon Jenner as they unleash flavors of plant-based cooking.

programme.title: From Food to Freedom
programme.desc: 6 people with type 2 diabetes in a house for 10 days, with only delicious food as their medicine.

programme.title: From Obese to Super Fit!
programme.desc: This is a journey millions of people want to take and can. Dropkick the weight-loss drugs now!

programme.title: Jamaican Stuffed Sweet Potato
programme.desc: Gabrielle Reyes, aka One Great Vegan, makes magic with sweet potatoes! Sing it, girl! And, get more

programme.title: Wicked Kitchen BBQ Beans
programme.desc: Join the Wicked Kitchen and learn how to make the best BBQ beans

programme.title: Preserving A Dharma Kingdom
programme.desc: In a world ripped apart by greed &violence, one nation measures Gross National Happiness!

programme.title: Meet the Woman Saving Orangutans from Extinction!
programme.desc: Hear Dr. Galdikas’ journey to save orangutans and protect rainforests in Borneo. Join the mission!

programme.title: S3E9 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: S3E3 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: S5E4 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: S4E9 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: S3E8 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: S4E4 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: Goatman
programme.desc: A news reporter and her crew investigating the legend of "Goatman" in a dense forest find themselves in danger, getting a bigger story than any of them could imagine...

programme.title: Demonic Plastic Surgeon, MD
programme.desc: At an elderly peoples home, a demonic plastic surgeon has been summoned. And soon, they will all be due a make over...

programme.title: Python Island
programme.desc: A group of people searching for a magical tree in a mysterious jungle, find they are not alone. Something is watching them, waiting for the perfect moment to strike...

programme.title: Ouija Deadly Reunion
programme.desc: Strange happenings occur to some friends before a birthday party in a large warehouse. Two of them find an old spirit board and they decide to contact the dead victim former tenants...

programme.title: Naufragio
programme.desc: Mientras transportaba un paquete importante, una joven sufre un accidente de coche en medio de la nada, dejándola atrapada debajo del coche. Poco a poco, se da cuenta de que no solo unos hombres muy malvados la persiguen para recuperar el objeto que transporta, sino que algo muy peligroso la acecha desde las profundidades del bosque...

programme.title: El Juego del Duende
programme.desc: Después de que un hombre adinerado envía a un grupo de ladrones a buscar leyendas urbanas con la intención de abrir un museo lleno de criaturas míticas, pronto descubrirán la leyenda de un duende...

programme.title: Verano Sangriento
programme.desc: Cuatro jóvenes llegan a Mallorca para disfrutar de unas idílicas vacaciones de verano, pero adentrándose en los lugares más inhóspitos de la isla comenzarán un viaje infernal...

programme.title: Juicios de Brujas
programme.desc: Dos realizadores de documentales y un ex policía investigan la desaparición de una niña que se rumorea que fue secuestrada por una bruja en los bosques encantados de Connecticut...

programme.title: El Pistolero
programme.desc: Uno de los hombres más poderosos de México llega a un pueblo en busca de nuevos pistoleros que quieran formal parte de su equipo, y recluta a un hombre sencillo que acepta el trabajo porque quiere vengar la muerte de su padre.

programme.title: El Cartel de la Línea
programme.desc: UNA MUJER Y SU HIJO ESTÁN EN BÚSQUEDA DE SU ESPOSO ERNESTO DESPUÉS DE QUE FUE DEPORTADO DE ESTADOS UNIDOS A TIJUANA BAJA CALIFORNIA MEXICO, SIN SABER NADA DE SU PARADERO. MIENTRAS TANTO ERNESTO CONOCE A DON DIEGO QUIÉN LO ENSEÑA A TRABAJAR EN CARROCERÍA. Y EN ESE TALLER LLEGA EL PRIMO UN JEFE DE UN CARTEL Y LE OFRECE TRABAJO A ERNESTO PARA GANAR DINERO FÁCIL.

programme.title: Expediente 53 3.0
programme.desc: Un extraño ser del más allá regresa con sed de venganza para acabar con todas las personas que lo han estado atormentando por todos estos años, decidiendo poseer a Jack y darle más fuerza a Baal.

programme.title: El Mariachi Gringo
programme.desc: Comedia romántica sobre un joven de la América profunda que -tras tener como improvisado maestro de guitarra a un emigrante- viaja a México huyendo de su vida tediosa y de su familia, para ejercitarse como mariachi.

programme.title: Canon: Fidelidad al Límite
programme.desc: Mariana de 35 años, es una arquitecta que trabaja y es socia de un importante despacho de arquitectos, está casada con Julián de 40 años, quien es corresponsal de guerra. Está enamorados, felices, con relación sexual cotidiana. Son padre de dos hijos de 14 y 17 año. En el juego sexual, Julián menciona que no le importaría la infidelidad a condición de estar enterado del hecho con detalles.

programme.title: Soy Una Buena Persona
programme.desc: Sabina es una treintañera muy "artista" convencida de que podrá algún día vivir de su arte como diseñadora, actriz, guionista o directora, porque ella está destinada a petarlo. Mientras, como casi toda su generación, malvive gorroneando en casa de sus padres. Pero una noche tiene, por desgracia ajena, una oportunidad de lujo... y no dudará en aprovecharla sin pensárselo demasiado.

programme.title: La Sangre Iluminada
programme.desc: Seis personajes explican su compleja existencia entrelazada. Cada cierto tiempo, debido a matemáticas inexplicables, la vida de estos personajes cambia y ocupan el cuerpo de otro

programme.title: Inquebrantable
programme.desc: Lupita vive en Ciudad Juárez con su hija Margarita, el esposo de Margarita es un alcohólico, mujeriego, y golpeador, la hija de Lupita, Margarita va a la universidad pero desde niña tiene una enfermedad de un mal cardiaco causado por la violencia domestica que ha sufrido desde niña, el doctor Villa le comenta a Lupita que Margarita su hija va a morir si no tiene un donante de corazón, desesperada ella se pone a vender cualquier cosa de valor que tenga en su casa para comprar el corazón en el mercado negro.

programme.title: It's Not Over
programme.desc: Things really can change for you. Your past is not your prophecy. Stop allowing fear to predict your future, and begin to see it how God sees it. Pastor Jabin Chavez encourages us: “It’s Not Over.”

programme.title: Think Like A Reaper
programme.desc: In “Think Like A Reaper,” Pastor Steven Furtick shows us how to think about the outcome while living in the fear, frustration, and fatigue of right now. You’ll be encouraged that God is with you in your hard place, and help is closer than you realize.

programme.title: Don't Fight Your Future
programme.desc: In “Don’t Fight Your Future,” Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us how to nurture our now to get to the fruit of our future.

programme.title: Winded
programme.desc: If you’ve been feeling worn down or tired, this one’s for you. In “Winded,” Pastor Steven Furtick shows us that when the wind is against us and our energy is waning, God’s hand is still over us.

programme.title: The Prayer That Repairs
programme.desc: Don’t be so confused about the noise around you that you can’t hear the God who made you. When you’re faced with a struggle you didn’t see coming, remember that Jesus is already praying for you, and His prayer is stronger than any attack.
